acf.title: Global Head of Capital Development Strategy
acf.bio_copy:
Dave Swift is Global Head of Capital Development Strategy and responsible for overall strategic planning, new business development, capital development team enablement and investor relations & client service.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2015, Dave spent nine years at Fortress Investment Group in a variety of roles in their Capital Formation group, including most recently as the Global Head of Client Service for the Liquid Markets Hedge Fund business. Prior to his time at Fortress, he held a variety of consulting and senior management roles at Novell, Cambridge Technology Partners and Cambridge Management Consulting.

Dave received a BS in Health from George Mason University.
